::KitKat::

"You die for the leader only if you feel that you want to die for the 
leader.  Trust me, you'll know who to die for and who not to. But 
right now, let's not focus on that. Let's get the other stuff taken 
care of first."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> "Oh, my old leader said that getting killed is good, as long as you 
do it to
> protect who's in charge." Land Mine said...
